about.title: About
about.section-content: RefuBook is a website dedicated to helping and guiding Refugees in foreign countries. The website offers a wide range of resources and information to assist refugees in navigating the often-difficult process of settling in a new country. From finding housing and employment to enrolling in educational programs and accessing healthcare, RefuBook provides practical tips and advice to make the transition as smooth as possible. Additionally, the website also includes a community forum where refugees can connect with one another, share their experiences, and offer support to others going through similar struggles.

aboutPageCTA.title: Share your story, help others and get help from others
aboutPageCTA.text: Discover the newest articles written by experienced refugees, take advantages of it or share your feedback with them. Refubook is one of Recoded projects, it aims to help refugees help each other by writing their experiences and ideas.
